title: CMI插件的nick功能不能正常使用！
author: 翎鲲
txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content:
cmi.command.nick.bypassblacklist - 允许绕过昵称黑名单
cmi.command.nick.bypass.length - 允许绕过昵称长度限制
cmi.command.nick.bypassinuse - 允许使用已被使用的昵称
cmi.command.nick.different - 允许将昵称设置为与原始名称不同的昵称
cmi.command.nick.different - 允许将昵称设置为与原始名称不同的昵称

replies.author: 翎鲲
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content:
groups:
  vip3:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - cmi.colors.nickname.*
    - cmi.command.fly
    - cmi.command.hat
    - cmi.command.nick
    - cmi.command.nick.different
    - cmi.command.repair
    - cmi.command.repair.hand
    - cmi.command.sethome.15
    - cmi.command.tp
    - cmi.command.tpa.warmupbypass
    - cmi.command.tpahere.warmupbypass
    - deluxetags.tag.v3
    - quickshop.vip3
    - residence.group.vip3
    - v3
    - VIPjoinmsg.3
    inheritance:
    - df
    info:
      build: true
      prefix: ''
那我就不清楚了  这是我设置的vip组表
玩家可以正常改彩色中文名

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content: 或者试试指令 /nickname 名字

replies.author: Misaka。
replies.txt_content:
NickName:
  # Prevents players to change their nick name to one of defined without permission
  # Use lower case
  # cmi.command.nick.bypassblacklist
  # to bypass protection against already in use name/nickname use cmi.command.nick.bypassinuse
  BlackList:
  - admin
  - administrator
  - server
  - staff
  - staf
  # Min length of nick name, can be bypassed with cmi.command.nick.bypass.length
  MinLength: 1
  # Max length of nick name, can be bypassed with cmi.command.nick.bypass.length
  MaxLength: 12
  # Adds prefix for players nickname to indicate that its not real name. This can be added to display name with {nicknameprefix}
  Prefix: '~'
  # When true, will only add nickname prefix when its not same as original name. This can allow colorization or capitalization change without addign prefix
  PrefixWhenDifferent: false
  # When true, online players nick name will be included into tabcomplete
  IncludeInTabComplete: true
# Shows if there is an available new version on login with cmi.versioncheck permission node
这是cmi配置文件里的一段内容  楼主可以了解一下  如果这些方案也不行  我就无能为力了
